musicalLanguage.description: A joyful celebration of the birth of Stevie Wonder's daughter Aisha. The infectious chromatic harmonica riff and syncopated groove make it one of the most uplifting songs ever recorded.
musicalLanguage.structure: Intro (harmonica riff) - Verse - Chorus - Verse - Chorus - Solo - Verse - Outro
keyMoments: Harmonica intro: the iconic chromatic riff that defines the song
Verse groove: syncopated rhythm with major 7th and 9th chords
Chorus lift: the melody soars on 'Isn't she lovely'
styleTips: Keep a bouncy, swinging feel throughout
The left hand drives the groove — keep it tight and rhythmic
Let the joy come through — this is a celebration
